result.eng: I'd rather stay inside the building.

result.eng: I'd like to keep this book if I may.

result.eng: I'd like a pint of beer please.

result.eng: If I had money, I'd buy a big house.

result.eng: I'd say I had more to drink that he.

result.html: Phósfainn duine ar bithI'd marry anybody!

result.eng: I don't know what I'd do without you.

result.eng: If only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.

result.eng: I hardly imagined I'd leave the way I did.
